articles.content: Poco X3 Pro and Poco F3 are expected to launch sometime this month. Both the phones have been spotted on multiple certification sites earlier. As per a tipster, the upcoming Poco F3 has been spotted … [+2053 chars]

articles.author: Debashis Sarkar
articles.title: Oppo F19 Pro Plus 5G launched at Rs 25,990: All details about Oppo’s new 5G phone - Gadgets Now
articles.description: Oppo has launched its new 5G phone flaunting high quality cameras, 50W fast charging and attractive design. There’s only one variant of the phone with 8GB RAM+128GB storage at Rs 25,990. Here’s all the details.
articles.content: There's a dual nano SIM card slot. Talking about 5G, the supported bands include 5G (NR TDD): N77/N78/N41, 5G (NR FDD): N1.
